comments: Product of next n numbers divided by product of first n numbers. E.g. a(4) = (7*8*9*10)/(1*2*3*4)= 210. - _Amarnath Murthy_, Mar 22 2004
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..370
formula: For n >=1, product k=1, ...n A014068(n) = A022915(n) - Dan Fux (dan.fux(AT)OpenGaia.com or danfux(AT)OpenGaia.com), Apr 08 2001For n > 0, a(n) = A022915(n)/A022915(n-1) - _Gerald McGarvey_, Jul 26 2004a(n) = binomial(T(n+1), T(n)) where T(n)= the n-th triangular number. - _Amarnath Murthy_, Jul 14 2005a(n)=(C(C(n+2,n),n+1)) for -1 to infinity. [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 30 2009]
prog: (Sage) [(binomial(binomial(n+2,n),n+1)) for n in xrange(-1, 17)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 30 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
